title: Start
body:
Oracle appears.

"Chosen one, the order has been compromised.
The storm of 1674 has weakened the fabric of time and space, causing a time rift here and now."

[[Why? |RestoringTheSquare]]  [[I'm not taking part in this|Lame user]]

title: RestoringTheSquare
body:
"Now that they are restoring the Dom Tower the rift has been opened.
Several historical figures  have been transported to the present, as well the basilisk of Utrecht."

"The terrible beast has left them petrified throughout the city.

You must free them and send them back to their time line and defeat the Basilisk to impeach the collapse of history.
If you fail, the rift will grow bigger, sucking in Utrecht and its inhabitants, and eventually the entire world."

"If you succeed, you shall be rewarded for your bravery." 
[[I'm brave|continue brave]]  [[But how?|continue brave]]

title: DoNotQuestionFate
body:
"It is not for us to question fate. Now be on your way. Time is ticking."
 [[okay|Nextlevel]]  [[But wait, I've some more que.|Nextlevel]]

title: Nextlevel
body:
Common rue potion appears 

Basilisk character chart appears

Oracle character chart appears

[[Go to Villon|GotoVillon]]

title: GotoVillon
body:
Press put concoction on statue button

  "Merci stranger"

"Oh non! La police is there!"

Villon runs away

[[Oh no! He stole my wallet-I'll tackle him!|Stolenwallet]] [[He stole my wallet!- "Hey wait up!"|Waitup]]

title: GotoCarilloner
body:
Press put concoction on statue button

"Oh Thank you"

Give paper button

Carilloner plays the song 

"The Builder forgot his hammer. Might you please bring it to him for me? 
He ran to the garden to take care of his flowers as soon as his shift ended"

Pick up hammer button  

<<if visited("Carilloner")is true>> [[ Go to the Builder|GotoTheBuilder|]]

Route to next location appears

title: GotoTheBuilder
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Thank you Dakhaas!"


[[ Dakhaas? |Dakhaas]] [[ Who are you calling Dakhaas? Achterlijke gladiool|Dakhaas]]

title: GotoTruus
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Kameraad! Thank God the SS did not catch you."


Give the Daffodils button.


"Oh! Good! If we want to end the occupation of the Square we need to move quickly"

This document will set us free. 

My contact is waiting in front of the University Building"


Pick up Declaration button

<<if visited("Truus")is true>> [[ Go to Nassau|GotoNassau|]]
Route to next location appears

title: GotoNassau
body:
Press put concoction on statue


"You took your time!

Do you know who I am? 

Why didn't you save me before?

Don't you know I have other things to do!"

Player: [[ answer: Be thankful that I saved you period. I can also re-petrify you if you are not happy.|YouAchterlijkeGladiool]] [[ answer: Tell me more.|Nottime]]

title: GotoAnnaMaria
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Thank you discipulus!"


"Oh no my books must have fallen when I was attacked by that beast."

[[ Help |Helper]]   [[ Don't do anything|Slacker]]

title: GotoBuysBallot
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Did you that storm?! This is excellent research subject. Yes, excellent!"


"This was a close one. If it was not for this lightning rod, I would have been electrocuted."


Buys Ballot cuts the wire and takes out the sword from the ground and give it to you.


"I have no use for it now, you can return it to its owner."


Button pick up sword (with wire around the handle). 


<<if visited("BuysBallot")is true>> >> [[ Go to Brinno|GotoBrinno]]


Route to next location appears

title: GotoBrinno
body:
Press put concoction on statue button (limes)


"Soldier! The beast slayed so many of our army. 

I attacked it with my sword but it was futile.

His scales are as hard as diamond.

His eyes are made of fire. 

His breath is putrid and will make you faint on the spot. 

Be brave soldier. A death in battle is a noble death."



[[ answer: Run for your life- End game now |Endgamenow]] |]][[ answer: A death in battle is a noble death- Continue playing|OracleAppears]] |]]

title: Nottime
body:
"You plebs!"


Can't you see that I am the brother of William of Orange?

My time is too valuable to waste on you.

I have a declaration to sign."


Nassau looks in pocket for declaration 
Nassau cannot find the declaration


"Huh were did go?"


Give the declaration button


[[Is this what you are looking for?|givedeclarationtonassau]]

title: YouAchterlijkeGladiool
body:
"You Achterlijke Gladiool!"

"How dare you talk to me this way?!

Do you want to be under the Spanish occupation?

We need to unite  northern provinces."


 [[Oh really, with what declaration? |givedeclarationtonassau]]

title: OracleAppears
body:
"Congratulations Chosen One, you have freed all the corrupted figures, saving their lives!"


"However, your quest is not yet over. 

You must now defeat the Basilisk. 

Basilisks's weakness are their eyes.

You must find the most reflective surface on the Square.

Be on your way Chosen One, time is ticking."

<<if visited("OracleAppears")is true>> >> [[ Go to the Sun|GototheSun]]

title: Endgamenow
body:
Oracle appears


"You fool! You have doomed us all!"


Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 



"Can you hear it? The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dance in victory. 


The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 

The screen goes white. 

Mushroom cloud animation with message. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you"
Player: [[ answer: Oh No! Return to battle |OracleAppears]] |]][[ answer:Ok|end1 lame user stops the game]] |]]

title: end1 lame user stops the game
body: quit game button

title: GototheSun
body:
Pick up the sun button



Basilisk: "angry" screeeeeech 


Basilisk retreats to the shadows of the Dom Tower.The Basilisk is ready to fight.


<<if visited("GototheSun")is true>> >> [[ Go Under the DOm|GoUnderDomTower]]

title: GoUnderDomTower
body:
The basilisk hiding in the passage under the Tower.


The basilisk sees you. 

It starts rattling its scales. 

It leans towards you, orienting its deadly gaze towards your face. 

A thunderstorm began to growl in its throat.

Player:[[ Look |Death end]] [[ Avert your eyes |Continue]]

title: Continue
body:
Use the Sun button


You take the Sun and puts it in front of your face.


The basilisk jumps back with an angry snarl. 

But it is too late. 

His deadly power is transforming him into a statue. 

The statue shatters. 

The Stone transforms into dust and is aspirated by the time rift. 

The rift slowly closes. 

The Basilisk is defeated.

<<if visited ("Continue")is true>> >> [[  Next|GotoEnd2]]

title: Death end
body:
"You fool! You have doomed us all!"


Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 


"Can you hear it? 

The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dance in victory. 


The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 

The screen goes white. 

Mushroom cloud animation with message. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you!"

Player: [[ answer: Oh No! I didn't look |Continue]] [[ answer:Ok|end1 lame user stops the game]]

title: GotoEnd2
body:
Oracle appears again 

"Congratulations Chosen One, you have saved the World!"


"Here is your reward,take a screenshot now before it goes away"


Pick Reward button. 


"Goodbye Chosen One"

end of protoype/level1

title: Dakhaas
body:
"Oh don't make a fuss about it. It is just a term of endearment."


"Here, take these blomme. Could you give them to Truus? 

I admire her deeds a lot and I heard they are her favorite."


Pick up Daffodils button


<<if visited("Builder")is true>> [[ Go to Truus|GotoTruus|]]
Route to next location appears

title: Stolenwallet
body:
Tackle Villon

"You don't have to be violent mon ami.

You looked very heavy and I just wanted to relieve you of the weight"


Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.

look down and see a page of sheet music on the ground. It must have fallen when you tackled him.

Pick up paper button

Oracle: Look at the back of the paper, it is addressed to the Carilloner

<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] 

Route to next location appears

title: Waitup
body:
Villon stops for a second and turns around.
 

 [[Aren't you forgetting something?|Villon gives wallet back]] [[You thief!|Villon gives wallet back]]

title: Helper
body:
Help Anna Maria pick up the books

Button give the quill 


"Oh thank you. 

 You should not help me, the other students might bully you too if they see you help me."


 [[I don't care|conversationmaria]] [[No problem! happy to help!|conversationmaria]]

title: Slacker
body:
Anna Maria picks up the books.


Give the quill button. 


Anna Maria leaves 
See book on the ground

Pick up book button


See Buys Ballot on the cover


<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]
Route to next location appears

title: continue brave
body:
"Take this common rue concoction, apply it on the petrified characters and they shall be freed from their bronze prison"

"You will find the Poet Fran√ßois Villon behind Dom Church.Go to him, he will help you find the other historical figures. Be careful! Villon has been know to pick a pocket or two."

"Now be on your way Chosen one, good luck!"
[[Wait, why me? |DoNotQuestionFate]] [[Ok|Nextlevel]]

title: Villon gives wallet back
body:
"Me?"

"Oh you mean the wallet? I don't know how that got there."

 "Pardonne-moi mon ami!"


Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.


Villon drops a paper of sheet music 


Pick up paper button 

Oracle: "Look at the back of the paper is addressed to the Carilloner"

<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] |]]

Route to next location appears

title: Lame user
body:
"Are you devoid of any sense of bravery and righteousness?

The faith of the world is at stake!" 

 [[Yes i'm a coward take me out of here|End game start (lame user)]][[ No I want to help! |RestoringTheSquare]]

title: End game start (lame user)
body:
Oracle appears

 "You fool! You have doomed us all! "

Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 

"Can you hear it?"

"The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dance in victory. 
The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 
The screen goes white. 
Mushroom cloud animation with message. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you"
 [[end game|end1 lame user stops the game]] [[No wait! Take be back|RestoringTheSquare]]

title: givedeclarationtonassau
body:
"You dief! How did you steal it?"


Nassau does not give you time to respond. 

He signs the declaration with a quill and throws it on the ground after using it and leaves.


Pick up quill button.


<<if visited("Nassau")is true>> [[Go to Anna Maria|GotoAnnaMaria]] 

Route to next location appears

title: conversationmaria
body:
"I even  have to take classes hidden behind a curtain because of those bullies.
But it is not that all bad, Professor Voetius has been very kind in helping me join the University."


Anna Maria leaves 


See book on the ground


Pick up book button


See Buys Ballot on the cover


<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]
Route to next location appears
